description.english: Fill the ending train with moths.
description.french: Remplissez le train de fin avec des papillons.
description.spanish: Llena el tren final con polillas.
description.japanese: 最後の列車の中を蛾でいっぱいにする
description.brazilian: Infeste o trem final com mariposas.

description.french: Battez la Nuit Étoilée de Fleur Bouton.
description.italian: Completa la "Notte Stellata dei Fiori Bottone".
description.spanish: Vence la Noche Estrellada sobre Flores de Botón.
description.japanese: 星空ボタン花をクリアする
description.brazilian: Prevaleça sobre a Noite Estrelada das Flores de Botão.
description.indonesian: Kalahkan Bunga Kancing di Malam Berbintang.

description.english: Let the ticket officer pick a name for you.
description.german: Lass die Ticketbeamten einen Namen für dich aussuchen.
description.french: Laissez l'agent de billetterie choisir un nom pour vous.
description.italian: Lascia che l'addetto alla biglietteria scelga un nome al posto tuo.
description.spanish: Deja que el oficial de boletos elija un nombre para ti.
description.schinese: 让乐园售票员帮你取名
description.russian: Позволь работнику билетной кассы выбрать твоё имя.
description.japanese: チケット売りに名前をつけてもらう
description.polish: Pozwól sprzedawczyni biletów wybrać ci imię.
description.turkish: Bilet görevlisinin sizin için bir isim seçmesine izin verin.
description.brazilian: Deixe a bilheteira escolher um nome para você.
description.ukrainian: Дозвольте квитковому касиру вибрати для вас ім'я.
description.indonesian: Biarkan petugas tiket yang memilihkan nama untukmu.

description.english: Read the ending of Wuwu's Novel.
description.german: Lese das Ende von Wuwu's Novelle.
description.french: Lisez la fin du roman de Wuwu.
description.italian: Leggi la fine del romanzo di Wuwu.
description.spanish: Lee el final de la novela de Wuwu.
description.japanese: ウーウーの小説を最後まで読む
description.brazilian: Leia o final da história de Wuwu.
description.indonesian: Baca bagian akhir dari Novel Wuwu.

description.english: Eat the macaron obtained from Wuwu.
description.french: Mangez le macaron obtenu grâce à Wuwu.
description.italian: Mangia il macaron che hai ottenuto da Wuwu.
description.spanish: Come el macarrón obtenido de Wuwu.
description.schinese: 吃掉从乌乌那拿到的马卡龙
description.japanese: ウーウーからもらったマカロンを食べる
description.brazilian: Saboreie o macaron obtido de Wuwu.
description.indonesian: Makan macaron yang didapatkan dari Wuwu.

description.english: Pat all the paint off a toy block.
description.german: Haue die ganze Farbe von dem Block.
description.french: Tapotez toute la peinture d'un bloc.
description.italian: Togli tutta la vernice da un blocco.
description.spanish: Quita toda la pintura de un bloque.
description.schinese: 把一块积木上的颜料全部拍掉
description.japanese: 積み木の塗料を完全に取る
description.brazilian: Remova toda a tinta de um bloco.

description.english: Beat all three mini-games of the Wheel of Fortune.
description.german: Gewinne alle drei Spiele vom Glücksrad.
description.french: Remportez les trois jeux de la Roue de la Fortune.
description.italian: Completa tutti e tre i giochi della Ruota della Fortuna.
description.spanish: Gana los tres juegos de la Ruleta de la fortuna.
description.schinese: 达成幸运大转盘全部3个关卡的胜利条件
description.russian: Выиграй во всех играх Колеса Фортуны.
description.japanese: ルーレットのミニゲームを3つすべてクリアする
description.polish: Wygraj wszystkie trzy etapy Koła Fortuny.
description.turkish: Wheel of Fortune'daki üç oyunu da yendi.
description.brazilian: Vença os três jogos da Roda da Fortuna.
description.ukrainian: Виграй у всіх трьох іграх колеса фортуни.
description.indonesian: Kalahkan ketiga game dari Wheel of Fortune.

description.japanese: 300体の異常にショックを使う

description.english: Successfully answer 6 questions from black-and-white creatures in a row.
description.german: Schaffe es erfolgreich, 6 Fragen der schwarz-weißen Kreatur hintereinander zu beantworten.
description.french: Répondez avec succès à 6 questions consécutives des créatures noires et blanches.
description.italian: Rispondi correttamente alle domande di sei creature bianche e nere di seguito.
description.spanish: Responde con éxito las 6 preguntas seguidas de las criaturas en blanco y negro.
description.schinese: 连续回答对6个奇怪黑白生物的问题
description.russian: Успешно ответь на вопросы чёрно-белых созданий 6 раз подряд.
description.japanese: モノクロの生き物からの質問に6問連続で正解する
description.polish: Odpowiedz na 6 pytań dziwnych czarno-białych stworzeń z rzędu.
description.turkish: Siyah-beyaz yaratıkların arka arkaya 6 sorusunu başarıyla yanıtlayın.
description.brazilian: Responda corretamente 6 perguntas seguidas das criaturas preto e branco.
description.ukrainian: Успішно дайте відповідь на 6 запитань чорно-білих істот поспіль.
description.indonesian: Berhasil menjawab 6 pertanyaan secara berturut-turut dari makhluk aneh hitam-putih.

displayName.japanese: 見えないペーパーボート

description.english: Make Demetria think you were separated.
description.german: Lasse Demetria glauben, ihr währt getrennt.
description.french: Faites croire à Demetria que vous avez été séparés.
description.italian: Fai credere a Demetria di esservi separati.
description.spanish: Hazle creer a Demetria que fueron separados.
description.schinese: 让迪绵瑞娅误以为和你走散
description.russian: Сделай так, чтобы Деметрия думала, что вы разделились.
description.japanese: デメトリアにはぐれたと思わせる
description.polish: Spraw, by Demetria omyłkowo myślała, że cię zgubiła.
description.brazilian: Faça Demetria pensar que vocês se separaram.
description.ukrainian: Змусьте Деметрію подумати, що ви розлучилися.
description.indonesian: Buat Demetria mengira bahwa kalian telah terpisah satu sama lain.

displayName.french: Sortie droit devant ! Sortie droit devant !
displayName.japanese: 出口はこの先！出口はこの先！
displayName.brazilian: Saída à Vista! Saída à Vista!
displayName.indonesian: Jalan Keluar di Depan! Jalan Keluar di Depan!

description.english: Check the exit of the Block Maze.
description.french: Vérifiez la sortie du Labyrinthe de Blocs.
description.italian: Vedi l'uscita del labirinto di blocchi.
description.spanish: Revisa la salida del Laberinto de Bloques.
description.japanese: 積み木迷路の出口をチェックする
description.brazilian: Confira a saída do Labirinto de Blocos.
description.indonesian: Periksa pintu keluar di Labirin Balok.

description.japanese: 引換券を合計5000枚手に入れる
